items.text: This AI is crazy. The entry points are very accurate, just yesterday verified 200 pips profit on XAUUSD. Totally worth it!
ARRA7 is different. The analysis is very detailed using SMC and Fibo. Trading is much more confident now.
Office work makes it hard to monitor charts. With ARRA7 just check AI analysis, simple but powerful.
